name: IShowSpeed's Adventure (DEMO)
description:
Story

 After IShowSpeed got knocked unconscious by his own PC, he woke up in a different world. He now must find Ben to escape and find the truth, since apparently Ben has been possessed and something weird is going on... 

Note : This game is just a fan-game and it's a joke. I do not own all the assets used in the video. It has simply been created for entertainment purposes. All credits go to the original owners.

Warning : This game contains profanity!

Playtime : 5-10 minutes

This game is just the DEMO, the game is in development. Bugs & glitches could appear and other assets could be missing!
